login.commandDescription: Login to Contentstack and save the session for further use
login.flagUsernameDescription: Email address of your Contentstack account

add.promptTokenAlias: Please provide alias to store token
add.promptEnv: Provide an environment for delivery token
add.promptConfirmReplaceToken: Alias with "%s" is already exists, do you want to replace?
add.commandDescription: Adds management/delivery tokens to your session to use it with further Contentstack/CLI command
add.flagAliasDesc: Alias to the token for referring it with other commands.
add.apiAliasDesc: Stack API key for the token you are going to store
add.flagForceDescription: Exclude confirmation to replace existing alias
add.flagAPIKeyDescription: Stack API key for the token
add.flagTypeDescription: Type of token adding, delivery/management or d/m
add.flagTokenDescription: Sets token. Can be set via environment variable 'TOKEN'. We recommend to use env variable

remove.msgAliasNotFound: No token found with alias %s. Select from following list.
remove.flagAliasDescription: Alias (name) of the token to remove
remove.flagIgnoreDescription: Ignores if token not present. Command shows show list of available aliases with multi select option to delete tokens from that list.

logout.promptConfirmLogout: Do you really want to logout?
logout.msgLogOutSuccess: You have logged out from Contentstack successfully!
logout.errorFailedLogout: Failed to logout due to following error:
logout.errFailedLogoutUnkwn: Failed to logout due to unknown error
logout.commandDesc: Log out from Contentstack and clear the session
